name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski

With proven abilities in developing scalable applications using modern frameworks and technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and leveraging cloud services, I have successfully led projects that focus on delivering innovative solutions in dynamic, fast-paced environments.
